name: 10 Second Runner
description:
Simple sci-fi endless runner platformer.
Play with your friends and compete for the highest checkpoint score.

This is a small game with simple arcade gameplay in the style of old Atari and C64 games, only made with modern game engine.

This project is still in development, I'm open to all bug reports, comments and wishes in case you happen to like the game. 

MINIMUM SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS

  • AMD Phenom(tm) II X6
  • 8GB RAM
  • NVIDIA GeForce GT 730 4GB
  • Windows 10 64bit

INPUT KEYBOARD CONTROLS

  • keys  W,A and D  for movement, alternatively you can use  UP, LEFT and RIGHT arrow keys
  • SPACEBAR for jumping over obstacles
  • E to activate night vision
  • hold SHIFT for sprint

GAMEPLAY MECHANICS

  • You start with 10 seconds of time, each checkpoint you reach adds another second.
  • If you run out of time, you die.
  • In addition, there are pickups that can give or take away seconds.
  • You can also sacrifice 2 seconds of your time to use night vision filter for about 10 seconds
